member.returns: A dictionary of created Lavalink clients.

member.returns: A dictionary containing instances for each shard.

member.summary: Gets the average frame deficit per minute.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment
member.summary: Represents Lavalink equalizer band adjustment. This is used to alter the sound output by using Lavalink's equalizer.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment.BandId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the band to adjust.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment.Gain
member.summary: Gets the gain of the specified band.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates a new band adjustment with specified parameters.
member.param: Which band to adjust. Must be in 0-14 range.
By how much to adjust the band. Must be greater than or equal to -0.25 (muted), and less than or equal to +1.0. +0.25 means the band is doubled.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType.RotatingIpRoutePlanner
member.summary: Route planner that switches the IP on ban.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType.BalancingIpRoutePlanner
member.summary: Route planner that selects random IP addresses from the given block.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType.NanoIpRoutePlanner
member.summary: Route planner that switches the IP on every clock update.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkRoutePlannerType.RotatingNanoIpRoutePlanner
member.summary: Route planner that switches the IP on every clock update and rotates to next IP block on a ban as a fallback.

member.summary: Represents arguments for a track playback start event.

member.summary: Gets the track that started playing.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackStartEventArgs.Player
member.summary: Gets the player that started playback.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackFinishEventArgs
member.summary: Represents arguments for a track playback finish event.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackFinishEventArgs.Track
member.summary: Gets the track that finished playing.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackFinishEventArgs.Reason
member.summary: Gets the reason why the track stopped playing.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackFinishEventArgs.Player
member.summary: Gets the player that finished playback.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason
member.summary: Represents a reason why a track finished playing.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.Finished
member.summary: This means that the track itself emitted a terminator. This is usually caused by the track reaching the end, however it will also be used when it ends due to an exception.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.LoadFailed
member.summary: This means that the track failed to start, throwing an exception before providing any audio.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.Stopped
member.summary: The track was stopped due to the player being stopped by either calling stop() or playTrack(null).

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.Replaced
member.summary: The track stopped playing because a new track started playing. Note that with this reason, the old track will still play until either its buffer runs out or audio from the new track is available.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason.Cleanup
member.summary: The track was stopped because the cleanup threshold for the audio player was reached. This triggers when the amount of time passed since the last call to AudioPlayer#provide() has reached the threshold specified in player manager configuration. This may also indicate either a leaked audio player which was discarded, but not stopped.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackStuckEventArgs
member.summary: Represents event arguments for a track stuck event.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackStuckEventArgs.ThresholdMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets the millisecond threshold for the stuck event.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackStuckEventArgs.Track
member.summary: Gets the track that got stuck.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackStuckEventArgs.Player
member.summary: Gets the player that got stuck.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackExceptionEventArgs
member.summary: Represents event arguments for a track exception event.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackExceptionEventArgs.Error
member.summary: Gets the error that occurred during playback.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackExceptionEventArgs.Track
member.summary: Gets the track that got stuck.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackExceptionEventArgs.Player
member.summary: Gets the player that got stuck.

member.summary: Represents arguments for event.

member.summary: Gets the WebSocket close code.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.WebSocketCloseEventArgs.Reason
member.summary: Gets the WebSocket close reason.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.WebSocketCloseEventArgs.Remote
member.summary: Gets whether the termination was initiated by the remote party (i.e. Discord).

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration
member.summary: Lavalink connection configuration.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.RestEndpoint
member.summary:
Sets the endpoint for Lavalink REST.
Defaults to 127.0.0.1 on port 2333.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.SocketEndpoint
member.summary:
Sets the endpoint for the Lavalink Websocket connection.
Defaults to 127.0.0.1 on port 2333.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.SocketAutoReconnect
member.summary:
Sets whether the connection wrapper should attempt automatic reconnects should the connection drop.
Defaults to true.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.Password
member.summary:
Sets the password for the Lavalink connection.
Defaults to "youshallnotpass".

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.ResumeKey
member.summary:
Sets the resume key for the Lavalink connection.
This will allow existing voice sessions to continue for a certain time after the client is disconnected.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.ResumeTimeout
member.summary:
Sets the time in seconds when all voice sessions are closed after the client disconnects.
Defaults to 60 seconds.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.WebSocketCloseTimeout
member.summary:
Sets the time in milliseconds to wait for Lavalink's voice WebSocket to close after leaving a voice channel.
This will be the delay before the guild connection is removed.
Defaults to 3000 milliseconds.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.Region
member.summary:
Sets the voice region ID for the Lavalink connection.
This should be used if nodes should be filtered by region with .

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of .

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration.#ctor(DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkConfiguration)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of , copying the properties of another configuration.
member.param: Configuration the properties of which are to be copied.

member.summary: Events containing raw payloads, received from Lavalink nodes.

member.summary: Events containing raw payloads, as they're being sent to Lavalink nodes.

member.summary: Events pertaining to Gateway Intents. Typically diagnostic information.

member.summary: Queues the specified track for playback.

member.summary: Queues the specified track for playback. The track will be played from specified start timestamp to specified end timestamp.

member.summary: Stops the player completely.

member.summary: Pauses the player.

member.summary: Resumes playback.

member.summary: Seeks the current track to specified position.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkGuildConnection.SetVolumeAsync(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the playback volume. This might incur a lot of CPU usage.
member.param: Volume to set. Needs to be greater or equal to 0, and less than or equal to 100. 100 means 100% and is the default value.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkGuildConnection.AdjustEqualizerAsync(DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkBandAdjustment[])
member.summary: Adjusts the specified bands in the audio equalizer. This will alter the sound output, and might incur a lot of CPU usage.
member.param: Bands adjustments to make. You must specify one adjustment per band at most.

member.summary: Resets the audio equalizer to default values.

member.summary: Represents Lavalink track loading results.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResultType.TrackLoaded
member.summary: Specifies that track was loaded successfully.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResultType.PlaylistLoaded
member.summary: Specifies that playlist was loaded successfully.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResultType.SearchResult
member.summary: Specifies that the result set contains search results.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResultType.NoMatches
member.summary: Specifies that the search yielded no results.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResultType.LoadFailed
member.summary: Specifies that the track failed to load.

member.summary: Represents information about playlist that was loaded by Lavalink.

member.summary: Gets the name of the playlist being loaded.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkPlaylistInfo.SelectedTrack
member.summary: Gets the index of the track that was selected in this playlist.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResult
member.summary: Represents information about track loading request.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResult.LoadResultType
member.summary: Gets the loading result type for this request.

summary.para: Gets the information about the playlist loaded as a result of this request.
Only applicable if is set to .

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResult.Exception
member.summary: Gets the exception details if a track loading failed.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadResult.Tracks
member.summary: Gets the tracks that were loaded as a result of this request.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadFailedInfo
member.summary: Represents properties sent when a Lavalink track is unable to load.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadFailedInfo.Message
member.summary: Gets the message of the sent exception.

member.name: P:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkLoadFailedInfo.Severity
member.summary: Gets the severity level of the track loading failure.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LoadFailedSeverity
member.summary: Represents severity level of the track loading failure.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LoadFailedSeverity.Common
member.summary: Indicates a known cause for the failure, and not because of Lavaplayer.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LoadFailedSeverity.Suspicious
member.summary: Indicates an unknown cause for the failure, most likely caused by outside sources.

member.name: F:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LoadFailedSeverity.Fault
member.summary: Indicates an issue with Lavaplayer or otherwise no other way to determine the cause.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkUtilities
member.summary: Various utilities for Lavalink.

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkUtilities.MayStartNext(DSharpPlus.Lavalink.EventArgs.TrackEndReason)
member.summary: Indicates whether a new track should be started after reciving this TrackEndReason. If this is false, either this event is already triggered because another track started (REPLACED) or because the player is stopped (STOPPED, CLEANUP).

member.name: M:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.LavalinkUtilities.DecodeTrack(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes a Lavalink track string.

member.name: T:DSharpPlus.Lavalink.JavaBinaryReader
member.summary: Java's DataOutputStream always uses big-endian, while BinaryReader always uses little-endian. This class converts a big-endian stream to little-endian, and includes some helper methods for interacting with Lavaplayer/Lavalink.
